text: The Great Dane is a large breed of dog. They are about or taller at the shoulder. Great Danes can have coats of a fawn color, black, Harlequin (a combination of black and white spots), blue, brindle, or mantle. The females are usually smaller and weight on an average of . Males are slightly larger. == Exercise == They need to be walked daily to maintain good health. == Other websites == * Standards ** FCI-Standard NÂ° 235 / 09. 08. 2002 * Miscellaneous ** Great Dane Barri ** http://www.dogbreedinfo.com/greatdane.htm Category:Dog breeds originating in Germany Category:FCI breeds
title: Great Dane
